title.rendered: Iconic Sheraton Sand Key Resort Unveils Spectacular Renovations Celebrating 50-Years of Excellence

content.rendered:
CLEARWATER BEACH, Fla., May 29, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The Sheraton Sand Key Resort, a historic beach destination for sunseekers and vacation enthusiasts on Florida’s illustrious West Coast, proudly announces the completion of its extensive renovations in celebration of its 50th anniversary.


Continue Reading

Nestled along Florida’s pristine west coast, the resort has undergone a transformative journey to elevate the guest experiences and set a new standard of luxury and relaxation. Boasting the exclusive privilege of a 13-acre private beach, and a storied legacy of hospitality and unmatched service, the resort stands as a sanctuary for travelers in search of serenity amidst the awe-inspiring natural vistas located on the outskirts of Clearwater Beach.

The highlights of the renovation include the resort’s 384 guest rooms and suites having been meticulously redesigned to offer the utmost in comfort and style. Featuring a mix of contemporary furnishings, plush bedding, and state-of-the-art amenities, each accommodation is an oasis of relaxation and indulgence. 

The company’s President, Tom Prescott, expressed, “The revitalized resort epitomizes elegance and contemporary sophistication, meticulously tailored to elevate guest comfort and forge indelible experiences.” He continued, “From the moment you step foot on the grounds, you are enveloped into a verdant tropical scenery and sweeping vistas of the tranquil Gulf of Mexico waters.”

EoA Group, the esteemed award-winning architecture firm, is globally recognized for its philosophy that design encapsulates the essence of human experience above all else. In this project, the firm infused a contemporary, quasi-nautical ambiance into the renovated interior, incorporating touches of driftwood and linen to impart a cozy charm. Drawing inspiration from the serene coastal aesthetic while incorporating elements from Marriott’s corporate branding, their design seamlessly blends hues of color that evokes a refreshing atmosphere in every space.

Boasting a private island setting on the quieter side of Clearwater Beach, the resort is committed to environmental stewardship and sustainability; incorporating eco-friendly practices throughout the property to minimize its carbon footprint and preserve the natural beauty of the surrounding ecosystem with a particular emphasis on our world-famous turtles.

To commemorate the occasion, the Sheraton Sand Key Resort invites guests to experience the ultimate beachfront getaway. Whether that be seeking a romantic retreat, a family adventure, a separate special event, or a rejuvenating team building group escape, there has never been a better time to discover the magic of the resort. Join us as we celebrate 50 years of excellence and embark on a new era of luxury and hospitality. For more information on the resort or to make a reservation, please visit  www.sheratonsandkeyresort.com.

SOURCE Sheraton Sand Key Resort

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/iconic-sheraton-sand-key-resort-unveils-spectacular-renovations-celebrating-50-years-of-excellence-302157690.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
